thread.section_title: Hotel Duo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Smart hotel
thread.title_full: Smart hotel - Review of Hotel Duo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sunseaandbeer
title: Smart hotel
text: This hotel was recommended by a colleague and didn't disappoint. Only stayed for one night. Smallish room but clean and comfortable. Decor is stylish and unique. Staff are very courteous and professional. Unfortunately, there was construction work being carried out which was noisy from 7:30 am. I will be staying here again.
